response.original_title: Zydeco Crossroads - A Tale of Two Cities
response.overview: In 2014 & 2015, filmmaker Robert Mugge assisted Philadelphia public radio station WXPN in it's exploration of the Creole culture of Southwest Louisiana via it's yearlong Zydeco Crossroads project. The resulting film features performances by C.J. Chenier, Rosie Ledet, Buckwheat Zydeco, Nathan Williams, Chubby Carrier, Rockin' Dopsie, Jr., Major Handy, Vasti Jackson, Creole United, and Soul Creole.
response.title: Zydeco Crossroads - A Tale of Two Cities

results.name: Preview for "ZYDECO CROSSROADS:  A Tale of Two Cities"
